author: SohamBhattacharya
body:
#### PR description:

Moved:
`Configuration/Eras/python/Modifier_run2_final_state_rad_cff.py` --> `Configuration/ProcessModifiers/python/run2_final_state_rad_cff.py` 
This enables the usage of the modifier by passing `--procModifiers run2_final_state_rad` to cmsDriver.
Look at [1] for details.

[1] https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39942#issuecomment-1335769783

Tagging @tvami
title: [106X] Rename modifier run2_final_state_rad
